attributes.description:
The Audi S3 is a compact hatchback produced by German car manufacturer Audi. It is the more sporty and supped up version of the A3 which is powered by a 2.0 litre turbocharged FSI petrol engine which produces a power output of 188kW. This vehicle comes standard from Audi with ABS, Airbags, Aircon, Electric windows, Electric mirrors, Leather heated racing seats, Cruise control, Aircon, Parking distance sensors, Central locking, BOSE sound system, 18" Alloy wheels, Xenon lights, Fog lights, Front loader radio and service history.

For more information, contact 083 509 1700 or 072 824 2534

All sales subject to balance of Factory warranty or warranty purchase.
